title: Marketing Manager (m/f) - Biomin Holding GmbH
subtitle: Getzersdorf, Lower Austria 3131
body:
At BIOMIN we harness the power of science to support animal health and performance. By applying state-of-the-art and proprietary technology we deliver natural, sustainable and profitable solutions to the livestock industry. For over 35 years we have pioneered innovative solutions for mycotoxin risk management and gut performance. BIOMIN is part of ERBER Group..


To further secure our rapid growth looking for the right woman or man to fill our vacant position as

Marketing Manager (m/f)

In this marketing key role you will report directly to the Managing Director of BIOMIN and will be responsible for the coordination of BIOMIN’s global marketing activities. You will work closely with our Product Management teams, as well as our internal graphics, event management and digital marketing team and external agencies.

These are the tasks we trust in you:

  • Responsibility for the content and communication of the branding handbook of the BIOMIN brand and BIOMIN product brands
  • Roll out of Corporate Identity and Corporate Design guidelines globally
  • Proactive support of BIOMIN projects, e.g. product launches, innovation projects, etc.
  • Coordination of content and communication for events and global marketing initiatives

 

To leave real 'foodprints' with us you need the following skills:

  • Completed educational background in marketing, ideally with first experience in agriculture, life science or related
  • Several years experience in a similar role in marketing or product management, ideally in the life science industry
  • Structured working style and holistic thinking
  • Excellent communication skills and intercultural competence
  • Fluent in German and English

Our culture: Pioneers, Partners and Performers – this means for you:

  • 100% of trust in you and your skills in advance
  • A task with development potential and high degrees of freedom
  • Exciting and challenging European and global tasks
  • Internal and external development programs
  • Have a look at our  Sustainability Report  to get to know us even better.
  • Here are some more good reasons to work for us.

 

What else do you need to know?

  • Reference Number: 643
  • You will be based in Getzersdorf (Austria)
  • Your type of employment: 38.5 hours/week, full-time, permanent contract
  • This position is available immediately however, we are happy to consider your notice period or your desired start date.
  • Based on your classification in our ERBER Group career model, your professional experience and your qualification, we offer you an attractive total compensation package starting at € 55 000 gross p.a. (full-time incl. fix and variable components)

 

Are you ready to leave real 'foodprints‘ with us? We are looking forward to your online application.

Do you have any questions? Please contact: Ms Melanie ZORN, +43 2782 803 0
Or visit our website: www.biomin.net
